column1: Art Institute of Chicago////What can one say that hasn't already been said? An incredible museum. In this native New Yorker's humble opinion
column2: while smaller in size than the MET
column3: the Art Institute packs just as much of a punch. Not a 1 day museum. In particular
column4: I love the space devoted to the Impressionists - a great collection of Van Gogh
column7: among others. The modern art wing is wonderful too.
